applicable licensing statutes and rules. Your license is renewed, and you will be receiving

you move, please notify us at least 30 days in advance.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available, and you need to speak to someone

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The agency is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The agency was offered technical assistance in the following areas:
• It was recommended the facility look at all possible programs to operate from
the facility.
V. CONSULTATION
The agency was offered consultation in the following areas:
• They requested knowledge of the different DHHS contracts and a contact in
contract department was provided.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
Maltreatment in Care
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.

Corrective Action Plan Compliance
The agency has not been required to submit any corrective action plans during this
period under review.
Financial Overview
There are no financial concerns identified based on the review of the facility's
budget and the agency's financial audit.
PREA compliance (if applicable)
N/A
Chief Administrator Assessment
The new Chief Administrator reported the program officially closed on November
30, 2022 since they were unable to hire a therapist for the program. This past
program was under contract with ORR. She is activity seeking programming
opportunities for the facility.
Staff and Youth Interviews
No staff employed at this time and the program has not had any youth in the
program since late March 2022 and was officially closed on November 30, 2022.
Description of Agency Walk Through
Single story facility in very good repair. The facility is furnished appropriately, and
all items required to be locked were found to be locked. There is running hot and
cold water in all bathrooms and the kitchen. The drains work as required. There is
no food present because the program is currently not operating. Fire extinguishers
were updated and in compliance.

VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the agency is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes. It is recommended that the agency be issued a renewal of their regular
license.
